dmca.title: MyspaceMaster.net - Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 05, 2007 2:28 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2941989N] MyspaceMaster.net - Cease and Desist

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. MyspaceMaster.net - Cease and Desist

FILETIME=[5D56DB00:01C74990] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Site: MyspaceMaster.net / IP: 207.218.245.135 
 
To Whom It May Concern, 
  
You are illegally using and distributing copyright protected content: 
http://myspacemaster.net/marquee 
Stolen from:
http://freecodesource.com/index.php?page=myspacegenerators/marqueegen 
http://myspacemaster.net/image-effects 
Stolen
from:http://www.freecodesource.com/index.php?page=myspacegenerators/imag
eeffects 
 
This is a class 2 felony punishable by severe fines and, in some cases,
prison time.  
  
You have until 8:45 PM EST Tuesday, February 6th to have the above
content stolen from freecodesource.com completely removed from
myspacemaster.net and another sites you own or operate.  
  
In the meantime, I will be contacting Google Adsense, your advertising
network, to notify them that you are breaking the law.  They will stop
serving you ads and you will effectively, have no income.  
  
Respond to this email immediately, if you do not wish to lose your
publisher status with Google. 
  
If you do not comply within the aforementioned time period, I will file
a formal complaint with the Federal Copyright Commission and they will
contact your local and state authorities.  At that point, the process
cannot be stopped and you will be fined, jailed, or both. 
  
William Smith 
Owner / CEO 
FreeCodeSource.com 
FreeCodeSource LLC
